Garbage 
Garbage

The City of White Oak has an exclusive sanitation contract with [Republic Services](javascript:;). For questions or concerns about service or [Pinehill Landfill](javascript:;), please call Republic Service at 1-800-678-7274 (1-800-MRTRASH). For billing related questions, please call or email the [Utility Billing Office](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilities) at City Hall.

[Rates as of January 1, 202](https://www.cityofwhiteoak.com/utilityrates)5

White Oak's designated trash pick-up day is Wednesday; however, this may change periodically due to a holiday. Republic Service recognizes the following holidays:

* New Year's Day
* Thanksgiving Day
* Christmas Day

If one of these holidays land on a Tuesday or Wednesday, residents might see a service interruption. The city will notify any known changes as soon as possible via website and social media pages.

Republic Services requests customers have all garbage at the curb by 6:30 a.m. for collection, but please remember that there is a city ordinance which states that carts are not to be placed at the curb before 6:00 p.m. preceding collection day.

**City Clean-Up Days**

The City hosts a city clean-up opportunity four times a year. Dates are announced on the website and on the City's Facebook page. During this time, residents can bring bulky unwanted items to the area behind public works located on Highway 42, behind the water treatment plant. Items not allowed are:

* Paint
* Oil
* Tires
* Shingles
* Appliances with compressors
* Batteries
* Any other hazardous materials

**Landfill Access**

Customers are allowed two truck-load trips to the [Pinehill Landfill](javascript:;) per month accompanied with your most recent original water bill. The physical address for the landfill is 1102 Pine Hill Landfill Road, Kilgore, TX 75662.

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
